Title: Abandoned
Writer: Eriprando Visconti (story), Eriprando Visconti, Francesco Maselli, Ageo Savioli
Actors: Lucia Bosè, Isa Miranda, Jean-Pierre Mocky, Goliarda Sapienza
Plot: In the summer of 1943 Countess Luisa and her son Andrea left Milan to escape the bombings and retreated to their country villa, where they host two of Andrea's contemporaries, cousin Carlo,...
